title: Everyone Wants That HL3.txt Reference in Dota to be About Half-Life 3
text:
Everyone Wants That HL3.txt Reference in Dota to be About Half-Life 3 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
As discovered by the Steam Database Twitter, a recent update to Dota 2 included a number of files that reference things like an RPG, zipline...
